entry.title: CTxIn::nSequence
entry.summary: The email thread is discussing the purpose of CTxIn::nSequence in Bitcoin. Patrick Strateman shares a link to a Stack Exchange question that provides a thorough answer. Additionally, a higher level answer can be found on the Bitcoin wiki page for Contracts. The email includes information about a sponsored Windows program for building apps for the Windows Store and a link to join the Bitcoin-development mailing list. However, the main topic of discussion is the significance of CTxIn::nSequence in Bitcoin.
